channel.title: [Dev] Rune Guardian [/DEV]
channel.description:
[font=Verdana][center][b]Need coder's for clients, websites and servers![/b][/font]
Hey there, well im not going to do a massive introduction just yet, ive had some work on the server so far but i kinda need a hand,
What i am looking for:
[i][b]Working Glories Dueling rings Castle wars (I think i can handle this easy!) A portal for level 100's+ that leads you to another premium city A bar and bartender at home for a night out :P Drop party room A much better clan system Working energy potions Full following, none of that no-clip poop Staff lounge Administration Portal
Fixed lunar and prayer interfaces and spells Adding music Possibly a 1337 client frame New custom items monsters and stuff Fixing custom crowns, adding our own
Team; J a y (me) a few other friends, and hopefully people from here?
